# Marketing: defined

.pull-left[

Marketing is the activity, processes and institutions for creating, communication, delivering, and exchanging offer that have value for customers, clients, partners and society at large.

]

.pull-left[

**Marketing** is the activity, processes and institutions for creating, communication, delivering, and exchanging offer that have value for customers, clients, partners and society at large.

]

.pull-right[

**Marketing management** is the art and science of choosing target markets and getting, keeping, and growing customers through creating, delivering and communicating superior customer value.
